snippet: A judge found that the founder, Kong Hee, and five other church officials had misused millions in church funds to support the music career of Mr. Kong’s wife.
abstract: Singapore court convicts megachurch pastor Kong Hee of fraud, finding he and five City of Harvest Church officials misused $36 million in funds to promote pastor's wife's pop music career.
lead_paragraph: A judge found that the founder, Kong Hee, and five other church officials had misused millions in church funds to support the music career of Mr. Kong’s wife.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Singapore: Pastor of a Megachurch Is Convicted of Misusing Funds
headline.main: Singapore Megachurch Founder Is Convicted of Fraud
